headline: Trump Administration Plans to Boost Tax Break for Corporations
summary: The tax guidance, which could come as early as next week, would allow companies to take full advantage of lucrative research and development tax breaks included in President Donald Trump’s “One Big Beautiful” tax bill, according to people familiar with the matter.  The Treasury proposal will address an issue that has vexed major corporations and their Washington lobbyists for months: a Biden-era 15% minimum tax on companies earning at least $1 billion prevents businesses from fully claiming those R&D deductions.
